properties.name: influxdb.url
properties.description: URL of the InfluxDB server. Example: http://localhost:8086.

properties.name: influxdb.org
properties.description: Name of organization in InfluxDB. Example: Development.

properties.name: influxdb.bucket
properties.description: Name of bucket in InfluxDB. Example: Metrics.

properties.name: influxdb.retention-period
properties.description: Duration in seconds for how long data will be kept in the database. Minimum: 3600 (1h).

properties.name: influxdb.shardGroupDuration
properties.description: Defines the duration in seconds that each shard in the shard group covers. Each shard contains only points with timestamps in a specific time range defined by the shard group duration. Minimum: 3600 (1h).
